chav1961.purelib.ui.interfacers

Interface RecordFormManager<Id,Instance>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FormManager<Id,Instance>

    public interface RecordFormManager<Id,Instance>

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  RecordFormManager.Action
      This enumeration describes action on the UI screen for processing callback

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RefreshMode onRecord(RecordFormManager.Action action, Instance oldRecord, Id oldId, Instance newRecord, Id newId)
      Processing record-scope actions on the UI screen

    • Method Detail

      • onRecord

        RefreshMode onRecord(RecordFormManager.Action action,
                     Instance oldRecord,
                     Id oldId,
                     Instance newRecord,
                     Id newId)
              throws FlowException,
                     LocalizationException

        Processing record-scope actions on the UI screen

        Parameters:
        action - record-scope action to process
        oldRecord - old record instance (will be null for RecordFormManager.Action.INSERT)
        oldId - primary key of the old record instance (will be null for RecordFormManager.Action.INSERT)
        newRecord - new record instance (will be null for RecordFormManager.Action.DELETE)
        newId - primary key of the new record instance (will be null for RecordFormManager.Action.DELETE)
        Returns:
        refresh mode after processing
        Throws:
        FlowException - on any errors or on action cancelling
        LocalizationException - on any errors in the localization
